20110113070837.000|20110113070838.000|CC1|RHETORIC, BY USING THE

20110113070841.000|20110113070842.000|CC1|WHICH TRADITIONALLY REFERS TO   
20110113070842.000|20110113070845.000|CC1|THE ACCUSATION THAT JEWS USED   
20110113070845.000|20110113070846.000|CC1|CHRISTIAN BABY BLOOD IN THEIR   
20110113070846.000|20110113070847.000|CC1|RITUALS.

20110113070849.000|20110113070852.000|CC1|THE BLOOD OF CHRISTIAN BABIES.  
20110113070852.000|20110113070854.000|CC1|OBAMACARE DOES.                 
20110113070854.000|20110113070857.000|CC1|THE POINT IS...                 
20110113070857.000|20110113070859.000|CC1|( APPLAUSE )                    
20110113070859.000|20110113070902.000|CC1|THE POINT IS, HOWEVER YOU FEEL  
20110113070902.000|20110113070904.000|CC1|ABOUT PALIN'S MAP, THERE IS ZERO
20110113070904.000|20110113070906.000|CC1|EVIDENCE THAT THIS MENTALLY ILL 
20110113070906.000|20110113070907.000|CC1|SHOOTER WAS INFLUENCED BY IT OR 
20110113070907.000|20110113070910.000|CC1|ANY OTHER HEATED POLITICAL

20110113073437.000|20110113073438.000|CC1|            Have you seen Zack?
